Wizard Feats: 10 selections
Enhanced Familiar: Can select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Familiar: May have a familiar
Improved Familiar Attunement: Familiar is the focus of Arcane Bond and has 4 additional abilities
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 100 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities

Spellbook Prodigy: Has the Magical Shorthand feature
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 7 from any)
Assurance (Farming Lore): Can take an automatic 38 on Farming Lore checks
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 4 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Magical Shorthand: Can learn new spells with 10 min of study and retry 1 week after a failure/Can learn new spells at a discounted cost
Quick Recognition: Can use a skill with master proficiency to Recognize a Spell as a free action once per rd
Recognize Spell: (R) Successful roll of the connected skill gives recognition of a spell; critical success also gives +1 against effects, and critical failure misidentifies it; trained, expert, master, or legendary proficiency guarantees success on spells up to level 2, 4, 6, or 10
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Terrain Expertise (Arctic): +1 Survival in Arctic
Terrain Expertise (Swamp): +1 Survival in Swamp
Terrain Expertise (Underground): +1 Survival in Underground
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information

Prodigious Will: Save Master (Will)

Prodigious Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Stubborn Persistence: Can avoid fatigue with a successful DC 17 flat check

Magic Notes:
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 3rd rank at will
Archwizard's Might: +1 10th level spell slot
Archwizard's Spellcraft: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
School Of Ars Grammatica: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Protective Wards arcane spell
School Of Battle Magic: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Force Bolt arcane spell
School Of Civic Wizardry: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Earthworks arcane spell
School Of Mentalism: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Charming Push arcane spell
School Of Protean Form: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Scramble Body arcane spell
School Of The Boundary: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Fortify Summoning arcane spell
School Of Unified Magical Theory: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Hand Of The Apprentice arcane spell
Bond Conservation: (1) Subsequent Drain Bonded Item leaves enough power to cast another spell 2 levels lower by the end of the next turn
Bonded Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Clever Counterspell: Can attempt a Counterspell with a -2 penalty vs. a known spell using any spell that shares a non-tradition trait with it
Conceal Spell: (1) Casts a subsequent spell without an incantation or obvious manifestations
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Effortless Concentration: (F) Extends the duration of 1 spell
Energy Ablation: (1) Casting a spell that inflicts energy damage gives self resistance to a chosen energy type equal to the spell rank
Experimental Spellshaping: Can choose 1 spellshape feat of up to level 10 to use each day
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Infinite Possibilities: Can prepare a spell slot to allow the casting of any known spell of at least 2 levels lower
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Arcane)
Linked Focus: Draining a bonded item to cast a spell restores 1 Focus Point
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Arcane)
Nonlethal Spell: (1) Changed the damage caused by a subsequent spell to non-lethal
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Reprepare Spell: Can spend 10 min to prepare a previously-cast spell or another spell of the same level
School Of Unified Magical Theory: Can use Drain Bonded Item once per spell rank each day
Spell Blending: Can use 2 spell slots from a level to prepare a spell up to two levels higher or use a spell slot to prepare 2 cantrips
Spell Combination: Can prepare a spell slot of each level above 2nd to cast a combination of two spells of 2 levels lower
Spell Substitution: Can use a 10-min process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Spell Tinker: (2) Alters the ongoing effect choice of a spell cast on self, reducing its remaining duration by half
Spellbook Prodigy: Critical failures to Learn A Spell are normal failures
Staff Nexus: Can cast spells from staff, using charges from 3 spells expended during daily prep
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Superior Bond: Can use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell of up to level 8 once per day
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Wizard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
